text: Georges Casanova (26 July 1890 - 20 February 1932) was a French fencer. He won a bronze medal in the team épée event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1932 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Algiers Category:Pieds-Noirs Category:French male fencers Category:French épée fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Georges Casanova
